description:
It`s the day of the Biting Festival, and the main event is a contest to choose the most exciting portable shrine. B.B.B.`s dad leads the team carrying his shrine, declaring that his will be the most popular this year. The crowd loves his shrine, but then Gabriel`s dad rides in on a magnificent gilded shrine that draws everyone`s attention! Which shrine will win the contest?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: おみこし, ワッショイ!?
